channel.title: Post on Anton S.
channel.description: Recent content in Post on Anton S.

item.title: DSI SUDS Research Day 2023
item.description: I was invited to Data Sciences Institute summer undergraduate research day. I presented and was voted best poster (1/3). The research day was a chance to appreciate the research of fellow undergrads and an opportunity to meet great people! Article

item.title: August 2023 Presentations
item.description: I will be presenting results from the project at MSRG in a few upcoming events. Data Sciences Institute Research Day - August 10th Format: Poster Location: Room 17020, 700 University Avenue, 17th Floor Undergraduate Engineering Research Day - August 16th Format: Podium Location: Myhal Centre website

item.title: IBM at U of T Conference
item.description: On April 18, I had the chance to attend the U of T IBM Quantum Computing Conference along with other MSRG members. It was a great opportunity to see the Canadian research being supported by IBM. Article

item.title: This website
item.description: This webpage was set up using HUGO, a static site generator, using the Lowkey theme. Later I painlessly switched to the Astatine theme. With the static site generator, adding content amounts to changing a markdown file, then CSS is generated by the theme’s template.
